description: Try our easy to follow Bug Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bug Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cup fine desiccated coconut (extra for coating)
pretzels, broken into small sections (for bug legs)

recipeInstructions.text: Place biscuits in a food processor and process to make fine crumbs (or crush well in a large ziplock bag with a rolling pin). Transfer crumbs to a mixing bowl. Add condensed milk, coconut, cocoa and vanilla extract and mix with a wooden spoon until well combined.
Refrigerate for 1 hour or until cold and firm.
Using damp hands, roll level tablespoons of mixture into balls.
Decorate the bugs by pressing in pretzels for legs, choc minis for eyes and two chocolate melts for wings.
